TopicTitle: SimGamerTV - Let's Play Season 2: Duna or Bust! (Vanilla)

Articles.Content:
My space program has reached a point where it's time to start looking at reaching other planets. This video series covers the episodes and bonus features for Season 2: Duna or Bust!

Episode 7 brings is another traversal to Duna, orbital entry and we get set to send a lander to the surface of Ike:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XaQ5OtBGVIY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In Episode 1 we build a Duna capable ship and set our sights to collect Science! and complete contracts from one of Kerbin's closest neighbors:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aUwknVuelcw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T18:25:34Z" title="08/11/2015 06:25  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by EtherDragon**

In Episode 2, we reach Duna orbit and begin our Science!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/GAgFhCfQLas?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In Episode 3 we collect a bunch of Science from Orbit around Duna and plan our return trip to Kerbin!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/MLzdd4ftvSA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

With our Science! in tow, it's finally time to return home from Duna and reap our rewards:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HtfuSohFep4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In this extended play, we build our first candidate rover and test it by driving around the KSC and gathering Science!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4voKFtrEREc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

It's episode 6 - time to setup and make the Burn for another trip to Duna - this time with a manned Ike Lander in tow:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8tRaJYwH7N0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Here is the build!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sOMaz8Nj4ig?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Episode 7 brings is another traversal to Duna, orbital entry and we get set to send a lander to the surface of Ike:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XaQ5OtBGVIY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
